note:
Trying to share in the open.
Metadata, resource description, open education for work; cycling, and random nonsense for play.

tbh, mostly random nonsense.

Don't feel obliged to follow back if i follow you, I try to follow folk more interesting than me.

Avatar: "stick man" from the cover of Led Zeppelin IV, a Victorian era photo of an old man carrying a big bundle of sticks on his back.
Header image: a rough wall of rocks very near the camera, over which can seen a distant mountain ridge.
